structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Atypical Working Frequency Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of frequency and intensity of atypical working arrangements including regular and occasional patterns for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Usually ←2008 At least half working days , 2009→
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who usually work atypical arrangements: at least half of working days (pre-2008) or at least twice (2009 onwards).

structure:Code.common:Name: Sometimes, ←2008 Less than half working days, 2009→
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who sometimes work atypical arrangements: less than half of working days (pre-2008) or once (2009 onwards).

structure:Code.common:Name: Usually, ←2008 At least twice, 2009 →
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who usually work atypical arrangements: at least twice (both pre-2008 and 2009 onwards).

structure:Code.common:Name: Sometimes ←2008 Once, 2009 →
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who sometimes work atypical arrangements: once (both pre-2008 and 2009 onwards).

structure:Code.common:Name: Usually
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who usually work atypical arrangements on a regular basis.

structure:Code.common:Name: Sometimes
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who sometimes work atypical arrangements on an occasional basis.
